law.catch_line: In addition to any powers set forth elsewhere, the Committee may:...

section.section: At least once a year, the Committee shall submit a report to the Legislative Policy Committee and, subject to § 2-1246 of this title, to the General Assembly.

The report shall:
describe the studies and other work of the Committee; and
include any recommendations of the Committee on:
more effective operation of the branches of the State government, in accordance with the laws of the State; and
legislative action that is needed to change or reverse a regulation of a unit of the Executive Branch of the State government.

text.section:
The failure of the Committee to comment on or to object to a proposed or adopted regulation is not an indication that:
the Committee approves the regulation;
the statute under which the regulation is adopted authorizes the adoption; or
the regulation conforms to the legislative intent of the statute.
